TopicTitle: Unbalanced fuel flow with radially attached engines/tanks

Articles.Content:
KSP Version: v1.0 Windows 32-bit (newest)

What Happens: Fuel Flow imbalance

Mods / Add-Ons: All Stock

Steps to Replicate:

1) launch the craft regularly and get it into orbit (skipper stage should last after 70 Km circulation)

 2) Stage so the Terrier stage is the current stage 

3) burn.

4) Wait until fuel imbalance occurs 

Result: fuel will drain at different rates from different tanks.

Fixes/Workarounds:

dont burn too hard when the imbalances are large. i was still able to return to kerbin with 1 engine still operating 

Other Notes/Pictures/Log Files: 

Craft File: [craft file here](http://kerbalx.com/Eladdv/MinMus-HO)

i have seen other reports of this bug. probably a common one even.
